tspan.tspan: Medals on the Rise: The Positive Impact of Hosting the Olympic Games on National Performance
Medal Count Ratio: A measure of a country's Olympic performance, calculated as the number of medals won divided by the number of Olympic participations (Data collected between 1986-2021)

rect.style: stroke-width: 1px; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-opacity: 0; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 0;

text.style: font-family: 'Source Sans Pro'; font-size: 14px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;
